executable.title: Synthetic image generation
executable.description: This module is used to make synthetic test images for experimentation and debugging.
executable.contributor: Please direct questions or suggestions to http://groups.google.com/group/plastimatch

string-enumeration.name: pattern
string-enumeration.description: Choose the pattern for the synthetic image
string-enumeration.label: Pattern

integer-vector.name: dim
integer-vector.label: Dimensions
integer-vector.description: This is the resolution of the image in voxels. Use a single number (such as "30") when the x, y, and z dimensions are teh same, or three numbers (such as "512,512,120") when they are different.

float-vector.name: origin
float-vector.label: Origin
float-vector.description: This is the location of the center of the first voxel in the image. Use a single number (such as "-250") when the x, y, and z origin values are the same, or three numbers (such as "-250,-250,-100") when they are different.

float-vector.name: spacing
float-vector.label: Voxel spacing
float-vector.description: This is the distance between voxels in mm. Use a single number (such as "2") when the x, y, and z voxel spacings are the same, or three numbers (such as "1,1,2.5") when they are different.
